items.message:
High tides, strong winds and large waves this evening may lead to flooding. Flooding is possible around the high tide between 10:30 PM on 19/08/2024 and 1:30 AM on 20/08/2024. Areas most at risk include Coast at North Morecambe Bay from Roosebeck to Carnforth including low lying areas around Ulverston, Greenodd, Haverthwaite, Flookburgh, Grange-over-Sands, Levens, Milnthorpe, Sandside, Arnside and Silverdale.
Further flooding is possible on the overnight tide tomorrow, 20/08/2024 into Wednesday, 21/08/2024, due to spring tides and strong winds over the next few days. We are closing flood gates at Arnside promenade, these will remain closed throughout the high tide cycle. Be careful along beaches, promenades, coastal footpaths and roads as large waves and sea spray could be dangerous. This message will be updated by 9:00 AM on 20/08/2024, or as the situation changes.
